body:
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (141.51 kb)

  
Report on the investigation of the loss of two lives and one seriously injured person on board the Singaporean registered tanker FR8 Venture close to the west pilot station to Scapa Flow in the Orkney Islands on 11 November 2006. Report no 16/2007. Published 18 July 2007.
